scripts.supabase:migrate: pnpm supabase:sync && pnpx supabase db push && pnpm supabase:commit
scripts.supabase:migrate:force: pnpm supabase:sync && pnpx supabase db push --force-db-reset && pnpm supabase:commit
scripts.supabase:types: pnpm supabase:sync && pnpx supabase gen types typescript --project-id newsofwpimzmfbqsooka --schema coderdojo > src/types/supabase.ts
scripts.supabase:reset: pnpm supabase:sync && pnpx supabase db reset
